title: BrikByte Studios ADR Front-Matter Schema
description: Canonical schema for Architecture Decision Record (ADR) front-matter used by BrikByte Studios.

seq.description: Numeric sequence that matches the filename prefix, e.g. 3 for 003-....md

date.description: Date the ADR was written or last updated (YYYY-MM-DD)

review_after.description: Optional: date after which the ADR should be reviewed (YYYY-MM-DD)

authors.description: List of authors by GitHub handle or name

area.description: One or more areas this ADR belongs to (e.g., PIPE, GOV, SEC)

rfc.description: Optional RFC document ID that this ADR relates to

supersedes.description: Optional list of ADR IDs that this ADR supersedes

superseded_by.description: Optional ADR ID that supersedes this ADR, or null

links.description: Optional list of related links (docs, PRs, issues, specs)

type.description: Link type, e.g., doc, issue, pr, spec
